pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:0.5: 5. The training rule on cleaning with water
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying in the Sakyan country in the Banyan Tree Monastery at Kapilavatthu,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.2: Mahāpajāpati Gotamī went to him and bowed. Standing downwind from him, she said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.5: “Well then, the nuns should clean themselves with water.” And the Buddha instructed, inspired, and gladdened her with a teaching,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.6: after which she bowed down, circumambulated him with her right side toward him, and left.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.7: Soon afterwards the Buddha gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.8: “Monks, I allow the nuns to clean themselves with water.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.1: Being aware that the Buddha had allowed cleaning with water,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.2: a nun did it too deeply, causing a sore in her vagina.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.3: She told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.4: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.5: “How could a nun clean herself too deeply with water?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.6: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.9: “How could a nun clean herself too deeply with water?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.11: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.12.1: ‘If a nun is cleaning herself with water, she may insert two finger joints at the most. If she goes further than that, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.2: washing the vagina is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.5: She may insert two finger joints at the most:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.6: she may insert two joints of two fingers at the most.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.7: If she goes further than that:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.8: if she consents to the contact and goes further even by a hair’s breadth, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.1: If it is more than two finger joints, and she perceives it as more, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.2: If it is more than two finger joints, but she is unsure of it, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.3: If it is more than two finger joints, but she perceives it as less, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.4: If it is less than two finger joints, but she perceives it as more, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.5: If it is less than two finger joints, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.6: If it is less than two finger joints, and she perceives it as less, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.2: if she inserts two finger joints;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.3: if she inserts less than two finger joints;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.4: if she does it because she is sick;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.6: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.7: The fifth training rule is finished.
